author: michaelwassmer
body:
DRAFT PR
Relevant information about this PR will be put here soon.

#### PR description:

This PR was made mainly to replace the sequences in PhysicsTools/PatUtils/python/tools/runMETCorrectionsAndUncertainties.py with tasks. This was requested on many occasions. Since this module is/was quite long the number of changes were also quite high. I tried to use the opportunity to also improve the style and formatting a bit. Moreover, I removed some old and unnecessary code blocks.

#### PR validation:

- [x] `scram b code-format`
- [x] `scram b code-checks`
title: Cmssw 12 5 2 rework met cors rebased
